com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations

Annotation Type CellSerializationDescriptor


  • public @interface CellSerializationDescriptor
    Defines how data must be serialized in the HyperEntity's Hypertable cell specified by columnFamily and columnQualifier.
    Author:
    Gabor Dicso

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String columnFamily
      The column family of the cell.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String columnQualifierFixedPart
      The fixed part of the column qualifier of the cell.
      SerializationTypes columnQualifierSerializationType
      Specifies the serialization type to be used in the column qualifier field of the specified cell.
      SerializationTypes valueSerializationType
      Specifies the serialization type to be used when storing the values in the cell's value field.

    • Element Detail

      • columnFamily

        public abstract java.lang.String columnFamily

        The column family of the cell.

        The columnFamily and columnQualifierFixedPart fields together are referred to as CellSpec.

      • columnQualifierFixedPart

        public abstract java.lang.String columnQualifierFixedPart

        The fixed part of the column qualifier of the cell. Note: the column qualifier of the actual cell inserted may contain field values after the column qualifier prefix provided in the columnQualifier field.

        The columnFamily and columnQualifierFixedPart fields together are referred to as CellSpec.

        Default:
        ""

      • columnQualifierSerializationType

        public abstract SerializationTypes columnQualifierSerializationType
        Specifies the serialization type to be used in the column qualifier field of the specified cell. Affects only the HyperEntity field values stored in the column qualifier; column qualifier prefix will be serialized in plain text anyway.
        Default:
        com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations.SerializationTypes.BINARY

      • valueSerializationType

        public abstract SerializationTypes valueSerializationType
        Specifies the serialization type to be used when storing the values in the cell's value field.
        Default:
        com.inepex.hyperconnector.annotations.SerializationTypes.BINARY
